items.text: pitched up around off and middle, flatter this time, blocked again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: slower in the air, length outside off, comes forward and pushes it on the off side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: fuller on the pads, flicked behind square to get off the mark
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, comes forward and blocks
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.preText: Mustafizur Rahman, first signs of seam bowling. A wide slip, mid-off and mid-on are up
items.text: back of length outside off, defended from the crease
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

items.text: back of length outside off once again, pushed towards covers
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

items.text: back of length, in the rib cage this time, dabbed towards square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

items.text: short of length, just outside off, defended down the wicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

items.text: back of length outside off, drops it towards covers with soft hands and scampers across
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: back of length, angling across, once again extra bounce for the bowler, defended on the back foot
items.postText: Over to Saurabh for the next set of ten overs
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.preText: Thanks Hemant. Steady sort of start for West Indies, but they'll be looking at the run rate now
items.text: comes forward to drive to cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: drifting down the pads and turned away to short fine for a quick single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: nicely forward to defend this fuller length ball
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: stays in his crease to turn this to square leg. Bowled slightly wide of the crease and angling into the batsman
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: skips down the track to drive but can't go past cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.preText: Mehidy has been cautioned for running on the danger area
items.text: fuller length, flighted outside off, he stretches forward and dabs it to cover's left for a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good short ball, rears up from back of a length, and he fends it down from just below his throat
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: length ball, straying on the pads, tucked to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Slip still in for the Fizz
items.text: length ball outside off, he stays back to punch it to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

items.text: back of a length again, but didn't bounce quite as high as he would have thought. Pulls it, but under-edges it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, drops it down near him and they run through for a quick single. Mehidy ran quickly in from backward point to field it, but the batsmen had made it - even if it was a direct hit
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: length ball on the stumps, he opens the face of the bat to steer it to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Md Siam Ahmed: "Bangladesh struggling to pick up a suitable X1 because of numerous inform players was something I had never seen in my life. But now.. Now i can die in peace."
items.text: that kept lowoutside off and he had to get the bat down in a hurry to keep it out
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: pushed to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: turned to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run
